page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main employers in the area of West Horndon are the industrial estate and Brown and Tawse, where approximately 750 people work in total. Other employers are the shops who employ about 22 people, farms who employ about 19 people ,the school and the station who employ very few people. Not many people in the village work in West Horndon. Most of the people work in London or Dagenham and a few work in Basildon or Brentwood. Very few people in the area work shifts, although some of the busiest firms on the industrial site do. Not many people in the area work overtime. Most people enjoy their job but there are a few who don't. Not many people in the area are unemployed, although several are retired.
